mapper.select: select id, code, lesson_package_name, lesson_package_id, lesson_package_code, term, apply_start_time, apply_end_time, lesson_package_active_time, lesson_package_expired_time, term_state, class_limit, term_limit, selling_year, selling_month, college_type, study_cycle, lesson_package_type_id, pre_apply_maximum, actual_apply_start_time, actual_apply_end_time, forecast_name, force_next_issue, class_flag, giving_flag, status, init_status, create_time, update_time, created_by, modified_by, member_type_id, usage_state from iquanwai.term_schedule limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into iquanwai.term_schedule(code, lesson_package_name, lesson_package_id, lesson_package_code, term, apply_start_time, apply_end_time, lesson_package_active_time, lesson_package_expired_time, term_state, class_limit, term_limit, selling_year, selling_month, college_type, study_cycle, lesson_package_type_id, pre_apply_maximum, actual_apply_start_time, actual_apply_end_time, forecast_name, force_next_issue, class_flag, giving_flag, status, init_status, create_time, update_time, created_by, modified_by, member_type_id, usage_state) values (#{code}, #{lessonPackageName}, #{lessonPackageId}, #{lessonPackageCode}, #{term}, #{applyStartTime}, #{applyEndTime}, #{lessonPackageActiveTime}, #{lessonPackageExpiredTime}, #{termState}, #{classLimit}, #{termLimit}, #{sellingYear}, #{sellingMonth}, #{collegeType}, #{studyCycle}, #{lessonPackageTypeId}, #{preApplyMaximum}, #{actualApplyStartTime}, #{actualApplyEndTime}, #{forecastName}, #{forceNextIssue}, #{classFlag}, #{givingFlag}, #{status}, #{initStatus}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createdBy}, #{modifiedBy}, #{memberTypeId}, #{usageState})
mapper.update:
update iquanwai.term_schedule
code = #{code},
lesson_package_name = #{lessonPackageName},
lesson_package_id = #{lessonPackageId},
lesson_package_code = #{lessonPackageCode},
term = #{term},
apply_start_time = #{applyStartTime},
apply_end_time = #{applyEndTime},
lesson_package_active_time = #{lessonPackageActiveTime},
lesson_package_expired_time = #{lessonPackageExpiredTime},
term_state = #{termState},
class_limit = #{classLimit},
term_limit = #{termLimit},
selling_year = #{sellingYear},
selling_month = #{sellingMonth},
college_type = #{collegeType},
study_cycle = #{studyCycle},
lesson_package_type_id = #{lessonPackageTypeId},
pre_apply_maximum = #{preApplyMaximum},
actual_apply_start_time = #{actualApplyStartTime},
actual_apply_end_time = #{actualApplyEndTime},
forecast_name = #{forecastName},
force_next_issue = #{forceNextIssue},
class_flag = #{classFlag},
giving_flag = #{givingFlag},
status = #{status},
init_status = #{initStatus},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
created_by = #{createdBy},
modified_by = #{modifiedBy},
member_type_id = #{memberTypeId},
usage_state = #{usageState},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from iquanwai.term_schedule where lesson_package_id=#{lessonPackageId} and status=0 and usage_state=0;
